content: Self-Feed Bits Self-Feed Bits designed for fast drilling of deep holes in wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits ### FEATURES:Features Deeper reach than a hole saw into wood. No need to remove wood plugs. Ideal for drilling holes in wood for plumbing and running pipe. Extensions available up to 24 length for increased drilling depth. 4-6 business days lead time Applications Fast continuous and self feeding drilling in wood, timber, plywood, and drywall. Ideal for rough-in work into wood. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3697740 - 1 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699025 - 1-1/2 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699023 - 1-1/4 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3697741 - 1-1/8 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699026 - 1-3/4 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699024 - 1-3/8 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699029 - 2-1/4 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699028 - 2-1/8 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699030 - 2-9/16 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699031 - 3 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699032 - 3-5/8 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699033 - 4-5/8 Self Feed Drill Bit - Package Size 1 pc - 3699034 - 9-1/2L Extension 7/16 Hex - Package Size 1 pc - 3699035 - 12L Extension 7/16 Hex - Package Size 1 pc - 3699036 - 18L Extension 7/16 Hex - Package Size 1 pc - 3699037 - 24L Extension 7/16 Hex - Package Size 1 pc
